## Helpers

### Server Timing

The `servertiming.js` is a little helper to parse the `Server-Timing` headers and create a csv file.

Usage:

```
$ for ((i=1;i<=10;i++)); do curl -s -D - http://localhost:3000/pipeline.html | fgrep Server-Timing; done | node ./bin/servertiming.js
```
